summary: Deeply in debt to the Russian mob, a master jewel thief recruits a talented burglar to help filch two Faberge eggs worth a cool $20 million each.
cast: Rebecca De Unamuno|Shardyn Fahey-Leigh|Sabrina Zeng|Sean Hatten|Tayzin Fahey-Leigh|Jasmine Yip|William Anthony|Ellen Brown|Makirum Fahey-Leigh|Alex Chambers|Eliza Pall|Celeste Stambolis|Antonia Horafiaris|Mike McLaughlin
title: The Code
